mapper.insert: insert into user_file(user_id, file_id, file_name, file_extension, file_pid, folder_type, delete_flag, recovery_time, create_time, last_update_time) values (#{userId}, #{fileId}, #{fileName}, #{fileExtension}, #{filePid}, #{folderType}, #{deleteFlag}, #{recoveryTime}, #{createTime}, #{lastUpdateTime})

insert into file( file_md5, file_sha1, file_sha256, file_category, storage_id, file_size, file_cover, refer_count, status, transcode_status, create_time, last_refer_time ) values ( #{fileMD5}, #{fileSHA1}, #{fileSHA256}, #{fileCategory}, #{storageId}, #{fileSize}, #{fileCover}, #{referCount}, 1, #{transcodeStatus}, #{fileCreateTime}, #{fileCreateTime} )
mapper.update: update user_file set delete_flag = 1, recovery_time = #{recoveryTime}, last_update_time = unix_timestamp(now()) * 1000 where id = #{id}
update user_file set delete_flag = 0, recovery_time = null, last_update_time = unix_timestamp(now()) * 1000 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT uf.*, f.file_md5 as fileMD5, f.file_sha1 as fileSHA1, f.file_sha256 as fileSHA256, f.file_category as fileCategory, f.storage_id as storageId, f.file_size as fileSize, f.file_cover as fileCover, f.refer_count as referCount, f.status, f.transcode_status as transcodeStatus, f.create_time as fileCreateTime, f.last_refer_time as lastReferTime FROM user_file uf LEFT JOIN file f ON uf.file_id = f.file_id WHERE uf.user_id = #{userId} AND uf.delete_flag = 1 ORDER BY uf.last_update_time DESC

SELECT uf.*, f.file_md5 as fileMD5, f.file_sha1 as fileSHA1, f.file_sha256 as fileSHA256, f.file_category as fileCategory, f.storage_id as storageId, f.file_size as fileSize, f.file_cover as fileCover, f.refer_count as referCount, f.status, f.transcode_status as transcodeStatus, f.create_time as fileCreateTime, f.last_refer_time as lastReferTime FROM user_file uf LEFT JOIN file f ON uf.file_id = f.file_id WHERE uf.delete_flag = 1 AND uf.recovery_time IS NOT NULL AND uf.recovery_time < #{currentTime} ORDER BY uf.recovery_time ASC
mapper.update: update file set refer_count = refer_count + 1 ,last_refer_time=#{lastReferTime} where file.file_id = #{fileId}
update file set refer_count = refer_count - 1 where file_id = #{fileId}
update file set status = 2 where file_id = #{fileId} and refer_count = 0
update file set status = 1 where file_id = #{fileId} and refer_count != 0
mapper.select: select * from user_file uf LEFT JOIN file f ON uf.file_id = f.file_id where file_pid = #{filePid}

WITH RECURSIVE folder_contents (id, user_id, file_id, file_name, file_extension, file_pid, folder_type, delete_flag) AS ( SELECT id, user_id, file_id, file_name, file_extension, file_pid, folder_type, delete_flag FROM user_file WHERE file_pid = #{folderId} UNION ALL SELECT uf.id, uf.user_id, uf.file_id, uf.file_name, uf.file_extension, uf.file_pid, uf.folder_type, uf.delete_flag FROM user_file uf JOIN folder_contents fc ON uf.file_pid = fc.id WHERE fc.folder_type = 1 ) SELECT fc.*, f.file_md5 as fileMD5, f.file_sha1 as fileSHA1, f.file_sha256 as fileSHA256, f.file_category as fileCategory, f.storage_id as storageId, f.file_size as fileSize, f.file_cover as fileCover, f.refer_count as referCount, f.status, f.transcode_status as transcodeStatus, f.create_time as fileCreateTime, f.last_refer_time as lastReferTime FROM folder_contents fc LEFT JOIN file f ON fc.file_id = f.file_id
mapper.update: update user_file set file_pid = #{targetFolderId}, last_update_time = unix_timestamp(now()) * 1000 where id = #{fileId}
mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE folder_path (id, file_name, file_pid) AS ( SELECT id, file_name, file_pid FROM user_file WHERE id = #{targetFolderId} AND folder_type = 1 UNION ALL SELECT uf.id, uf.file_name, uf.file_pid FROM user_file uf JOIN folder_path fp ON uf.file_pid = fp.id WHERE uf.folder_type = 1 ) SELECT * FROM folder_path WHERE id = #{folderId}
mapper.update: update user_file set favorite_flag = #{favoriteFlag}, last_update_time = unix_timestamp(now()) * 1000 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select uf.*, f.file_md5 as fileMD5, f.file_sha1 as fileSHA1, f.file_sha256 as fileSHA256, f.file_category as fileCategory, f.storage_id as storageId, f.file_size as fileSize, f.file_cover as fileCover, f.refer_count as referCount, f.status, f.transcode_status as transcodeStatus, f.create_time as fileCreateTime, f.last_refer_time as lastReferTime from user_file uf LEFT JOIN file f ON uf.file_id = f.file_id where uf.user_id = #{userId} AND uf.favorite_flag = 1 AND uf.delete_flag = 0 order by uf.last_update_time desc

SELECT uf.*, f.file_md5 as fileMD5, f.file_sha1 as fileSHA1, f.file_sha256 as fileSHA256, f.storage_id as storageId, f.file_size as fileSize, f.file_cover as fileCover, f.refer_count as referCount, f.status, f.transcode_status as transcodeStatus FROM user_file uf LEFT JOIN file f ON uf.file_id = f.file_id WHERE uf.user_id = #{userId} AND uf.delete_flag = 2
AND ( uf.file_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR uf.file_extension LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
AND uf.file_pid = #{folderId}
ORDER BY uf.folder_type DESC, uf.create_time DESC

SELECT f.file_id as fileId, f.file_md5 as fileMD5, f.file_sha1 as fileSHA1, f.file_sha256 as fileSHA256, f.file_category as fileCategory, f.storage_id as storageId, f.file_size as fileSize, f.file_cover as fileCover, f.refer_count as referCount, f.status, f.transcode_status as transcodeStatus, f.create_time as createTime, f.last_refer_time as lastUpdateTime FROM file f ORDER BY f.create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
